# pulled [[wool]] of low quality, generally detached from the animal's skin by a lime treatment
types.html:
abat-chauvée f (plural abat-chauvées)

  1. pulled wool of low quality, generally detached from the animal's skin by a lime treatment
trans: pulled wool of low quality, generally detached from the animal's skin by a lime treatment
